text: Shoccoe is an unincorporated community in Madison County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== A post office called Shoccoe was established in 1886, and remained in operation until 1909. A variant spelling is "Shocco". The name "Shoccoe" most likely is a transfer from a place in North Carolina. Shoccoe had a population of 25 in 1900. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Madison County, Mississippi
title: Shoccoe, Mississippi
